pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simple Blinding Index for Randomized Controlled Trials // Computes a simple blinding index for randomized controlled trials introduced in Petroff, Bacak, Dagres, Dilk, Wachter: A simple blinding index for randomized controlled trials. Contemp Clin Trials Commun. 2024 Nov 26;42:101393. doi:10.1016/j.conctc.2024.101393. PMID: 39686958.
